page.shortlink: api charting namespace chart svg to png method
page.description: Convert SVG content into a PNG bitmap image.
page.example:
dim svg as c = <<%str% <svg height="100" width="100"> <circle cx="50" cy="50" r="40" stroke="black" stroke-width="3" fill="red" /> </svg> %str%
dim bl as b = charting::Chart::SvgToPng(svg)
file.from_blob("c:\data\circle.png",bl)
